fields.headline: Tickets to ride
fields.bodyText: Six top destinations New York: £199 British Airways from Heathrow. Must be booked by January 25. Valid for departures January 15-March 16, March 25-April 30 and November 1-December 16. Minimum stay one Saturday night, maximum one year. Trailfinders (020-7938 3939, trailfinders.com). Sydney: £539 China Eastern from Heathrow (same fare available to Melbourne). Must be booked by January 31. Valid for departures January 16-March 9. Compulsory stopover in Shanghai on return flight. No minimum stay, maximum 90 days. Travelmood (08700 664556, travelmood.com). Los Angeles: £269 British Airways from Heathrow. Must be booked by January 25. Valid for departures January 15-March 16, March 25-April 30 and November 1-December 16. Minimum stay one Saturday night, maximum one year. Trailfinders (020-7938 3939, trailfinders.com). Hong Kong: £389 Emirates from Heathrow, Gatwick, Manchester, Birmingham or Glasgow via Dubai. Valid for departures until March 21. Minimum stay seven days, maximum two months. Quest Worldwide Travel (0870 4423513, questtravel.com). Paris: £57.30 BMI from Heathrow. Must be booked online (£10 supplement if booked by phone). Valid for departures indefinitely. No minimum stay, maximum one year. BMI ( flybmi.com, 0870 6070555). Amsterdam: £94.90 British Airways from Manchester. Must be booked online (£15 supplement if booked by phone). Valid for departures indefinitely. No minimum stay, maximum one year. British Airways ( ba.com, 0870 8509850). The pick of the rest Faro: £122 Monarch Airlines charter from Gatwick. Departs January 6 for seven nights. Avro (0870 4582847, avro.co.uk). Orlando £292 Virgin Atlantic from Gatwick. Must be booked by January 5. Valid for departures January 5-February 2. Minimum stay one Saturday night, maximum one month. Thomas Cook Flights Direct (08701 111111, thomascook.com). Havana: £453 Iberia from Heathrow, Gatwick, Manchester or Birmingham via Madrid. Valid for departures until March 16. Minimum stay six days, maximum three months. Journey Latin America (020-8747 3108, journeylatinamerica.co.uk). Perth: £535 Emirates from London Heathrow, London Gatwick, Manchester, Birmingham or Glasgow via Dubai. Must be booked by January 26. Valid for departures March 28-June 30. Quest Worldwide Travel (0870 4423513, questtravel.com). And the rail alternative Paris, Brussels: £59. Lille: £55 Eurostar from Waterloo or Ashford. Must be booked at least 21 days before departure. No advance booking required for Saturday or Sunday same day returns or trips including a Saturday night stay. Eurostar (08705 186186, eurostar.com). · NB Fares can change rapidly. These were available in reasonable quantities at the time of writing, but they can sell out in a sudden rush
